## ContextLogger.pushAttr() method

Push "attribute-like" context.

Following log messages will be prefixed with `name` or `.name` depending on current context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pushAttr(name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
